cancer.cause: Cancer is caused by changes (mutations) to the DNA within cells.
cancer.info: Cancer is a disease in which some of the bodyâ€™s cells grow uncontrollably and spread to other parts of the body.
cancer.cases: There are over 100 types of cancer, including breast cancer, skin cancer, lung cancer, colon cancer, prostate cancer, and lymphoma.
cancer.treatment: Treatment options include surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, immunotherapy, and targeted therapy.
cancer.hospitals: Famous medical programs include Mayo Clinic, MD Anderson Cancer Center, and Johns Hopkins Hospital.

diabetes.cause: Diabetes is caused by either the pancreas not producing enough insulin or the body's cells not responding properly to insulin.
diabetes.info: Diabetes is a chronic disease that affects how your body turns food into energy.
diabetes.cases: There are three main types of diabetes: type 1, type 2, and gestational diabetes.
diabetes.treatment: Treatment options include insulin therapy, oral medications, and lifestyle changes such as diet and exercise.
diabetes.hospitals: Famous medical programs include Joslin Diabetes Center, Cleveland Clinic, and Mayo Clinic.

heart disease.cause: Heart disease is caused by a buildup of plaque in the arteries, which can lead to a heart attack or stroke.
heart disease.info: Heart disease refers to various types of heart conditions, including coronary artery disease, arrhythmias, and heart defects.
heart disease.cases: Heart disease is the leading cause of death worldwide.
heart disease.treatment: Treatment options include lifestyle changes, medications, and surgical procedures such as angioplasty or bypass surgery.
heart disease.hospitals: Famous medical programs include Cleveland Clinic, Mayo Clinic, and Johns Hopkins Hospital.

stroke.cause: A stroke is caused by a blockage of blood flow to the brain or bleeding in the brain.
stroke.info: A stroke occurs when the blood supply to part of the brain is interrupted or reduced, preventing brain tissue from getting oxygen and nutrients.
stroke.cases: There are two main types of stroke: ischemic stroke and hemorrhagic stroke.
stroke.treatment: Treatment options include clot-busting medications, surgery, and rehabilitation therapy.
stroke.hospitals: Famous medical programs include Cleveland Clinic, Mayo Clinic, and Johns Hopkins Hospital.

alzheimer's disease.cause: Alzheimer's disease is caused by the buildup of amyloid plaques and tau tangles in the brain.
alzheimer's disease.info: Alzheimer's disease is a progressive neurological disorder that causes memory loss and cognitive decline.
alzheimer's disease.cases: Alzheimer's disease is the most common cause of dementia among older adults.
alzheimer's disease.treatment: Treatment options include medications to manage symptoms and support services for patients and caregivers.
alzheimer's disease.hospitals: Famous medical programs include Mayo Clinic, Cleveland Clinic, and Johns Hopkins Hospital.
